law.catch_line: Retention And Use Of Collected Registration Fees
law.text: The commissioner shall retain all registration fees collected under subsection (c) of section 149N and fines collected under clause (4) of subsection (b) of section 149U; provided, however, that revenue in excess of $100,000 annually shall revert to the General Fund. The retained revenue collected may be used by the commissioner to support the commissionerâ€™s registration, rulemaking and enforcement activities under sections 149M to 149W, inclusive.
